28namespace bitpit {
29
39template<typename value_t>
40typename LevelSetObject::CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<value_t> * LevelSetObject::getFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field) const
41{
42 LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
43 if (cacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
44 return nullptr;
45 }
46
47 std::size_t cacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
48
49 return getCellCache<value_t>(cacheId);
50}
51
60template<typename value_t>
61typename LevelSetObject::CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<value_t> * LevelSetObject::getCellCache(std::size_t cacheId) const
62{
63 if (cacheId == CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID) {
64 return nullptr;
65 }
66
67 return (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId].getCache<value_t>();
68}
69
76template<typename value_t>
77std::size_t LevelSetObject::createFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field)
78{
79 // Create cache
80 LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
81
82 std::size_t cacheId;
83 if (cacheMode != LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
84 LevelSetFillIn expectedFillIn;
85 if (m_kernel->getExpectedFillIn() == LevelSetFillIn::DENSE || cacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND) {
86 expectedFillIn = LevelSetFillIn::DENSE;
87 } else {
88 expectedFillIn = LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE;
89 }
90
91 cacheId = createCellCache<value_t>(expectedFillIn);
92 } else {
93 cacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
94 }
95
96 // Update field properties
97 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
98 m_cellFieldCacheIds[fieldIndex] = cacheId;
99
100 return cacheId;
101}
102
109template<typename value_t>
110std::size_t LevelSetObject::createCellCache(LevelSetFillIn expectedFillIn)
111{
112 // Create the cache
113 std::size_t cacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
114 if (dynamic_cast<const LevelSetCartesianKernel *>(m_kernel)){
115 if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::DENSE) {
116 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetCartesianKernel::CellDenseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
117 } else if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE) {
118 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetCartesianKernel::CellSparseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
119 }
120 } else if (dynamic_cast<const LevelSetOctreeKernel *>(m_kernel)){
121 if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::DENSE) {
122 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetOctreeKernel::CellDenseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
123 } else if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE) {
124 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetOctreeKernel::CellSparseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
125 }
126 } else if (dynamic_cast<const LevelSetUnstructuredKernel *>(m_kernel)){
127 if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::DENSE) {
128 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetUnstructuredKernel::CellDenseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
129 } else if (expectedFillIn == LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE) {
130 cacheId = m_cellCacheCollection->insert<LevelSetUnstructuredKernel::CellSparseCacheContainer<value_t>>();
131 }
132 }
133
134 return cacheId;
135}
136
151template<typename value_t, typename evaluator_t, typename fallback_t>
152void LevelSetObject::flushVTKOutputData(std::fstream &stream, VTKFormat format, LevelSetField field,
153 const evaluator_t evaluator, const fallback_t fallback) const
154{
155 LevelSetCacheMode fieldCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
156 switch (fieldCacheMode) {
157
158 case LevelSetCacheMode::ON_DEMAND:
159 {
160 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = getFieldCellCache(field);
161 for (const Cell &cell : m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
162 long cellId = cell.getId();
163 if (cache->contains(cellId)) {
164 flushValue(stream, format, evaluator(cellId));
165 } else {
166 flushValue(stream, format, fallback(cellId));
167 }
168 }
169
170 break;
171 }
172
173 case LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND:
174 {
175 for (const Cell &cell : m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
176 long cellId = cell.getId();
177 if (isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
178 flushValue(stream, format, evaluator(cellId));
179 } else {
180 flushValue(stream, format, fallback(cellId));
181 }
182 }
183
184 break;
185 }
186
187 case LevelSetCacheMode::FULL:
188 {
189 for (const Cell &cell : m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
190 long cellId = cell.getId();
191 flushValue(stream, format, evaluator(cellId));
192 }
193
194 break;
195 }
196
197 default:
198 {
199 for (const Cell &cell : m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
200 long cellId = cell.getId();
201 flushValue(stream, format, fallback(cellId));
202 }
203
204 break;
205 }
206
207 }
208}
209
223template<typename value_t, typename evaluator_t, typename fallback_t>
224value_t LevelSetObject::evalCellFieldCached(LevelSetField field, long id, const evaluator_t &evaluator, const fallback_t &fallback) const
225{
226 // Try fetching the field from the cache
227 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<value_t> *cache = getFieldCellCache<value_t>(field);
228 if (cache) {
229 typename CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<value_t>::Entry cacheEntry = cache->findEntry(id);
230 if (cacheEntry.isValid()) {
231 return *cacheEntry;
232 }
233 }
234
235 // Evaluate the field
236 value_t value = evalCellField<value_t>(field, id, evaluator, fallback);
237
238 // Update the cache
239 fillFieldCellCache(field, id, value);
240
241 // Return the value
242 return value;
243}
244
254template<typename value_t, typename evaluator_t, typename fallback_t>
255value_t LevelSetObject::evalCellField(LevelSetField field, long id, const evaluator_t &evaluator, const fallback_t &fallback) const
256{
257 BITPIT_UNUSED(field);
258
259 // Get cell location
260 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = getCellLocation(id);
261
262 // Early return if the zone has not been detected
263 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
264 return evaluator(id);
265 }
266
267 // Early return if the fallback value should be returned
268 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::BULK) {
269 if (m_cellBulkEvaluationMode != LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::EXACT) {
270 return fallback(id);
271 }
272 }
273
274 // Return the value
275 return evaluator(id);
276}
277
289template<typename value_t>
290void LevelSetObject::fillFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field, long id, const value_t &value) const
291{
292 // Early return if no cache is associated with the field
293 LevelSetCacheMode levelsetCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
294 if (levelsetCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
295 return;
296 }
297
298 // Early return if the cache doesn't need to be updated
299 //
300 // There are some cases were the cache doesn't need to be updated:
301 // - cells outside the narrow band should not be added to caches in "narrow band" mode.
302 //
303 // If the zone of the cell has not been detected, it's not possible to check the aforementioned
304 // conditions. In this case the cache can be updated only if it is operating in "full" mode and
305 // the bulk is evaluated using an exact method.
306 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = getCellLocation(id);
307 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
308 if (levelsetCacheMode != LevelSetCacheMode::FULL) {
309 return;
310 }
311
312 if (getCellBulkEvaluationMode() != LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::EXACT) {
313 return;
314 }
315 } else if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::BULK) {
316 if (levelsetCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND) {
317 return;
318 }
319 }
320
321 // Update the cache
322 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<value_t> *cache = getFieldCellCache<value_t>(field);
323 cache->insertEntry(id, value);
324}
325
326}

bitpit::LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE
@ SPARSE
bitpit::LevelSetFillIn::DENSE
@ DENSE
bitpit::LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND
@ NARROW_BAND
Data are cached only inside the narrow band.
bitpit::LevelSetCacheMode::NONE
@ NONE
No caching will be performed.
bitpit::LevelSetCacheMode::FULL
@ FULL
Data are cached in the whole domain.
bitpit::LevelSetCacheMode::ON_DEMAND
@ ON_DEMAND
Data are cached only where explicitly evaluated.
bitpit::LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN
@ UNKNOWN
Unknown location.
bitpit::LevelSetCellLocation::BULK
@ BULK
Bulk zone.
bitpit::LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::EXACT
@ EXACT
Exact data is evaluated.
